name: Publicly Readable Alibaba Buckets
query: { buckets( where: { cloudProvider: "alibaba" publicAccessBlocked: false OR: [ { acl_IN: ["public-read"] } { bucketPolicy: { statements_SOME: { effect: "Allow" OR: [ { actions_INCLUDES: "oss:GetObject" } { actions_INCLUDES: "oss:ListObjects" } { actions_INCLUDES: "oss:GetObjectVersion" } { actions_INCLUDES: "oss:*" } { actions_INCLUDES: "*" } ] principals_INCLUDES: "*" } } } ] } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory contentHash } }
